problem.title: The Problem
problem.subtitle: Online reviews are broken, and AI is making it worse.

trustCollapsed.title: Trust Has Collapsed
trustCollapsed.description: Consumer trust in online reviews has dropped sharply in recent years. AI-generated fake reviews are now cheap to produce at scale.

lostInScroll.title: Lost in the Scroll
lostInScroll.description: Your friend mentioned a perfect restaurant last week—but you can't find the message. Valuable word-of-mouth wisdom disappears in the scroll.

ratingsLostMeaning.title: Ratings Lost Their Meaning
ratingsLostMeaning.description: When everything is 4.5 stars, there's no way to differentiate. A vegan's glowing review tells a steak lover nothing. Your context is ignored.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.subtitle: BocaBoca captures and organizes authentic word-of-mouth recommendations, making them persistent and searchable.

trust.title: Recommendations You Can Trust
trust.description: Every suggestion shows who made it and why their taste aligns with yours. See where your friends are eating—no anonymous crowds, no hidden algorithms.

neverLost.title: Find It When You Need It
neverLost.description: Your dining intelligence stays organized and searchable forever. Find that perfect restaurant your friend mentioned six months ago.

ownProfile.title: Own Your Taste Profile
ownProfile.description: Your documented preferences become a portable asset you control. In an AI-driven world, verified human taste data is the missing ingredient.
